events.message: I purchased a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit well. I would like to return it and get a refund.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund based on keywords about returning the product and requesting money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request involving the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with the jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can process your refund quickly?
Sure! The order number is 58372910. The jacket is too small and doesn't fit as expected.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process. Please send the jacket back within 14 days using the prepaid return label.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully to your original payment method.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your return request.
As the refund has been completed and confirmed, we are now closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
